verbs.description: Controversy [V: has] swirled around Sebastian Gorka , one of President Trump 's top counterterrorism advisers , ever since he attended the president 's Jan. 20 inaugural ball wearing the honorary medal of Hungarian nationalist organization Vitezi Rend . NBC News traveled to Hungary to dig deeper into Gorka 's ties with the group , speaking with members of the organization as well as with locals who knew him when he lived there .
